answers.answer: 34 weeks but due to problems. I'm now 36 weeks with baby 2 and it ***** I so ready to have him

I deliver my first at 38 weeks, my second at 36 weeks and 3 days, I had preeclampsia with my previous and I was going to be induced but he decided to come early on his own (thank God), I am now 36 weeks and 2 days with my third and I am so ready to have him. I'm hoping he will be here by 37 or 38 weeks. My doctor told me she induces all her patients at 39 weeks, which I don't want so I'm keeping my first crossed and my hopes up. Good luck and God bless!
I'm 35w and 6d and I feel the exact same way! I want to go into labor asap! I'm so ready to have him! This heat is too much to bear while pregnant!lol
I had mine at 38weeksSex wine and exercise ball worked for me

You might feel that you're ready, but your baby isn't. Any baby born under 37 weeks are considered premature. They're still developing a their lungs. And you don't want to risk anything. Trust me I know the feeling, I'm 38 weeks, and hope he come soon. But just let the baby come when its ready

question: I'm barely 36 weeks pregnant and I'm so ready to have my girl lol.... I feel like a planet and being pregnant in this heat is taking a toll on me :( just wondering at how many weeks did you deliver your first baby ? I know every pregnancy is different but I'm just asking out of curiosity :)
title: SO READY!!
